dialogues.speaker: CLAUDE
dialogues.text: in human form, walks towards the glow from Andy's flashli around the bend. His naked body is taut and muscular - it looks thirty years younger than it should. His face is yo too - he looks the picture of a powerful young warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Man is something to be surpassed! A  rope, stretched over the abyss between  the animal and the Superman". Neitzche  was right, Andy. And now, I have  crossed that abyss. I am no longer  man OR beast, but man AND beast.  ADAM has lived up to its name. I am  the first new man, and my God it is  FUCKING MAGNIFICENT! You're already  half way there Andy. Feel the power  in your veins. With ADAM, you could  harness it. Master it. Let it  transform you into something more  glorious than your wildest dreams!

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: is shaking violently - on the brink of transforming. Sera raises the blade to him again. She's fading fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let me die for nothing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andy winces with pain - his brow bulges, his teeth enlarg the transformation is starting. Uncle Terrence is worried

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andy!

dialogues.speaker: CLAUDE
dialogues.text: still walking. The light is getting brighter - he's almos around the bend. He's buzzing with a scary kind of euphor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The choice is yours Andy: deny your  own blood, die an unfulfilled child,  or face the challenge of mind and  body united at last. Which will it  be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rounds the corner and sees Andy hunched over Serafine' body. He keeps walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be confused by old beliefs.  This is beyond mere words like good  or evil. You have to feel it!

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: whips around, BLOOD streaming from his mouth, gun aimed,  grip rock solid, his features back to normal, eyes locked the beast with determined, controlled rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feel this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! He pumps out two shots. One hits Claude in th upper left part of his CHEST. dialogues.text: sits leaning against a wall of skulls. The face wound is  bleeding but not mortal.

dialogues.text: Stupid boy...

Suddenly a sharp sound from behind him makes Andy jump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (French - screaming) STOP WHERE YOU ARE! HANDS UP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andy turns around. A scared COP is aiming his gun at him, shining a flashlight in his face. Andy puts his hands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh! Be quiet, man! We're not alone -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A ROAR cuts him off. The cop spins around - the beam from his flashlight flooding THE BEAST with light as it spring through the air at him. Andy runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (French) My God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets off one shot - it hits the beast in the arm, but  it's too late. The beast clamps it's massive jaw onto the cop's neck and bites his head clean off. THE HEAD rolls a the floor and comes to rest in a pile of skulls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Matter of factly) Good.

dialogues.text: is crouched at a corner of two catacomb tunnels, grenade  clutched in his hand. He hears something and carefully pe around the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) Just throw a strike...

dialogues.text: With a determined grunt, he pitches the grenade around th corner and then ducks back. Suddenly the beast's growling stops. Andy grits his teeth and closes his eyes, awaiting the explosion. Just silence. Then a small skittering soun close by. He opens his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: THE GRENADE
dialogues.text: skitters to a stop, a couple of feet from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.text: He bolts and gets five steps from it when KA-BOOM!! It explodes behind him, launching him through t air along with a spray of bones and rubble. He lands twen feet away and clutches his left leg, wincing in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh! Son of a bitch!

dialogues.speaker: LEDUC
dialogues.text: and the cops turn towards the sound of the blast.

dialogues.text: is transforming back into human shape. His face is now mo human than beast. He screams into the vertical passage in growling, not quite human voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have no advantage, Andy! My body  has no limits!

dialogues.text: crouches under a concrete ledge in a very dark space. Cla voice sounds distant, echoey, and competes with the close sound of trickling water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I assure you, your nervous sweat  glands will give you away soon enough  my trembling little rabbit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AHHHH! IT'S FUCKING GLORIOUS!  AAAARRGGGHHH!!

dialogues.text: huddles in his hiding place, looking out into the darknes

dialogues.text: (to himself) C'mon already...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RRAAAAAARRRRRRGGG!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEY YOU DIRTY EVIL FUCK! C'MON AND  GET ME! I DARE YOUR UGLY ASS! (etc.)

dialogues.text: My men think you died and floated  away in the Seine. If I wanted to, I  could let them believe that. (a long pause) But that would be illegal...

dialogues.speaker: INT. COURTROOM, NIGHT
dialogues.text: The prosecutor, who speaks English with a thick French ac has an extremely sarcastic look on his face. He wheels ar dramatically, and confronts Andy, who sits uneasily on th stand, wiping the sweat from his brow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You intend us to believe that you  committed these murders because the  moon was full and you were somehow  magically transformed into a huge  powerful beast with an insatiable  appetite for human flesh, is that  right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The prosecutor turns away towards the jury to mock Andy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh? So I don't understand? You think  it's me who has a hard time coming  to grips with reality?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The JURORS snigger at Andy's expense. But wait, suddenly  they look concerned - something's wrong. The prosecutor  continues, his back to Andy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I'm the one who needs my  head examined? I don't understand?  Well, Mr. McDermott, enlighten me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wheels around to Andy and comes face to face with

dialogues.speaker: THE BEAST
dialogues.text: huge and ravenous. It goes for his throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good God!!! Aaaaaaaa!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The beast tears the prosecutor apart, spraying blood  everywhere. The jury - oddly enough - break into polite  applause. One less lawyer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were screaming in your sleep,  sir. Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andy looks around, getting his bearings. He takes a deep  breath and shakes it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. It was just, um... something I  ate.
